seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Scientist (Contract)' with 3+ years of experience mentioned, but no explicit senior title or higher years requirement

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Scientist', and responsibilities focus on data science techniques, model training, and performance tracking

sub_specialty.evidence: Responsibilities include a mix of data science tasks (modeling, metrics, APIs) but no heavy emphasis on a specific sub-specialty like streaming or MLOps

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions steering development of products/services, maintaining clean production environments, and building/supporting a team of data scientists/analysts, but no explicit people management duties

primary_cloud.evidence: No explicit mention of cloud providers or services in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions 'pipelines' and 'data infrastructure' but no explicit tools or paradigms like batch/streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No explicit mention of orchestration tools or categories

storage_layer.evidence: No explicit mention of storage layers or technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Job posting states 'Work from Anywhere' and 'fully distributed company'

timezone_focus.evidence: Prioritizes meetings in US time zones but allows work from anywhere, suggesting a focus on countries with timezone overlap (Americas)

relocation_required.evidence: No mention of relocation packages or requirements; 'Work from Anywhere' implies no relocation needed

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of H1B sponsorship; contract role in specific countries suggests work authorization is required but not stated

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Contract role with no mention of student visa support; 'work from anywhere' may imply existing work authorization is required

citizenship_required.evidence: Equal Opportunity Employer statement and no restrictions on citizenship or work authorization mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Role is explicitly a contract position with no mention of W2 or full-time employment; benefits mentioned are typical for contractors (e.g., computer reimbursement)

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits mentioned include 'Work from Anywhere', 'Language Classes', 'Paid Vacation and Time Off', 'Parental Leave', and 'Computer', but these are minimal and typical for contract roles

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'we create an environment that stretches everyone to grow' but lacks specificity about career tracks or advancement

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with 'insurance domain experts and engineering team members' and 'building/supporting a team of data scientists and analysts'

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement paths in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role focuses on individual contributor tasks with no clear mention of management or other tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Job posting lists '3+ years of experience' and specific skills as requirements but does not use strict qualifiers like 'must have' for all items

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on data science responsibilities with a clear scope, not combining multiple roles

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requires 3+ years for a mid-level role but also asks for 5+ years of Python and experience deploying ML models to production, which is typically senior-level
